name: What's That Movie
description:
Special 3rd Anniversary Sale. After tirelessly saving millions from overage, DataMan celebrates with a massive sale party ;) Checkout our DataMan apps now.

Do you love movies? Think you're a bigger movie buff than anyone else? Test your movie knowledge as you race against time to answer the endless movie trivia thrown at you. Our original Multiplayer game mode lets you challenge up to 3 friends or anyone in the world. Score perfect answers and steal time from your foes. Best of all, it's free!

・ More than 400 movies across 4 levels
・ Free real-time multiplayer game
・ Discover the top movies in iTunes
・ Daily updates with new questions
・ Endless game play with Time Bonus
・ Level up and unlock harder questions
・ Incredibly fun trivia game for all movie lovers


Note: Multiplayer game is free for everyone. To remove auto-match wait time, you can invite your Game Center friends to play.
